articles.content: I have a friend who is a Texas Rangers fan. He doesnt nerd out on advanced stats or read prospect rankings or follow them religiously. He just checks the score and keeps tabs on whether they are good… [+12943 chars]

articles.title: Golf is Hard | 2022 Genesis Scottish Open - PGA TOUR
articles.description: Golf is hard. Links golf is even harder. Check out some of the best “golf is hard” moments from the 2022 Genesis Scottish Open at The Renaissance Club.SUBSCR...
